file_content.text: At least the Sith is dead. Whatever I've become, he was definitely a monster.
I'm not ready to face those agents. You handle them.
Mark Threes are tougher than I thought. Not much left of me, is there?
Galen, these wounds... there's nothing we can do for you.
Agent Galen = heavily damaged // Repair = impossible
I've got no regrets. This was my choice.
You'll be remembered as a hero, Galen. That's a promise.
You fought bravely.
I didn't take this job for the glory.
If you'd stayed at the factory, you'd still be alive.
I wish you hadn't done this.
Not worth it. Better this way.
You wanted to die. I hope you're happy.
Pleased with yourself?
You're a hard Jedi to like.
Find Sadic and destroy the Power Guard project. I'm counting on you....
Sadic's building his army in Shadow Town, an Imperial-controlled sector. Nastiest people on Nar Shaddaa, and that's saying a lot.
I'll give you the coordinates--aaaaah! Neural overrides restarting. There's nothing else to do--kill me.
There must be a way to free you. Give me time to defeat Sadic.
I can't do that.
Free me? From this?
Even without Sadic controlling me, I won't live like this.
You're absolutely certain this is the only way?
Are you sure?
I can't--won't--live like this. Not even human, anymore.
I'm sorry, but it's not my place to kill you.
I won't execute you.
Blast your Jedi morals! I'm a threat--to you, to the Republic!
If you won't do what's right, I'll do it myself.
Beg the stars you don't see me again....
I don't like the sound of that. We'd better hurry and find this base.
Agent Galen = in pain // Jedi + T7 = go to Sith base + help him?
Hold on, Galen. We need to face Sadic together.
Help me defeat the Sith.
We're the only people who can bring him to justice for what he's done. Are you with me?
Don't know how long I can resist his commands, but I'll try.
Safer if we don't travel together, just in case. I'll meet you inside Sadic's base in Shadow Town.
Hurry. We don't have much time.
You'll be avenged, Galen. I promise.
As you wish. [Kill him]
I don't plan to fight you twice. Goodbye, Galen.
Gladly. [Kill him]
I can't watch this....
T7 = commit Agent Galen to permanent memory files
Stop... I'm... I'm in control....
All that damage you did finally spread to the neural overrides. Only temporary, though.
I can already feel my systems repairing themselves.
Tell me how to free you from the Sith's control.
No, I'll help you.
Can't remove the machines without killing me, but I don't matter anymore.
Will you attack me again?
What happens after that?
I'll keep trying to fulfill my last command until I succeed--but we have bigger problems.
Tell me everything you know about the enemy.
Then hurry up.
The Sith--Lord Sadic--has the Republic's Mark Three Power Guards. Cybernetically enhanced soldiers armed with advanced weapons.
Sadic plans to build hundreds more, all controlled by him. An army to conquer Nar Shaddaa.
The Sith could make thousands--millions--of Power Guards.
And then the Republic.
I doubt the locals will lay down without a fight.
He'd war with the Hutts?
The Hutts are cowards. In the end, they'll surrender to save their fat hides.
From what I've seen, you Power Guards aren't so tough.
That doesn't scare me.
The Mark Ones and Twos you fought were early experiments. Mark Threes? Practically unstoppable.
You shouldn't have come. He'll make me hurt you.
He already forced me to give up my fellow agents. Now they're all dead.
Agent Galen? What happened to you?
Agent Galen = changed // 68.3 percent biological mass = replaced by cybernetics + synthetic materials
When I resist, the pain... he always wins.
I'll break his control over you, I promise.
Let me help you.
Too late. He's here....
The other Power Guards are mindless machines. Why aren't you?
You're alive?
He wanted me this way. And he knows you're here....
Don't make me kill you, Galen.
Fight harder, or die.
He won't let you destroy me....
Nothing more irritating than a Jedi who won't die. Your constant interruptions must end.
Your former ally will be your executioner. The new Agent Galen's power is matched only by his obedience.
He could've attacked me and didn't. His will is greater than yours.
He'll resist you.
He hasn't been properly motivated yet.
Face me yourself--or are you scared you'll wind up like Tarnis?
You're a coward.
Tarnis was a child, like you. Beneath me.
I've been carving up your little machines all day. He won't be any different.
I'll destroy him.
He's no machine. His mind is intact--even if his spirit isn't.
Galen, destroy my enemy.
No. I'd rather die.
Control factor six initiated....
Aaaaah!
Neural override complete. Launching elimination protocol. Target: Jedi.
I told you. He always wins.
Stay back. I don't want to hurt you.
